main event: A bright silver dollar-sized light blue object was spotted flying in a traffic pattern for 10 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright silver dollar-sized light blue object.
The object was flying in a traffic pattern, and the observer looked around and it just went out.
The observer was noted to be next to an Air Force base, and the maneuvers described appear to be those of an R/C (remote-controlled) aircraft.
The report concludes that the object was likely a balloon.
The weather conditions at the time of the sighting were noted, including low overcast conditions.
sighted object: a bright silver dollar-sized light blue object
photographs: no, the report does not include any photographs
